title: Bloomberg Markets: Trump Continues Warnings to North Korea
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Trump Continues Warnings to North Korea
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Justin Sink White House Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing President Trump keeping up his warnings to North Korean leader Kim Jong Un on Friday that the U.S. will strike back against any provocation after a week of rising tension that has roiled global markets. Roger Cressey, former White House Counterterrorism Official, also participates in the conversation.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
